about_the_game: In the demo version, players can go through the initial stage of the game, where they must extract resources, build structures and expand their settlement, while monitoring resources and managing them effectively. The demo version also includes an exciting aspect of warfare, where players can use their army to attack neighboring enemy villages. The demo is designed so that players can feel the atmosphere of Pitchfork Battles and feel the mechanics of the game.
